text: Jean-Denis Bredin (17 May 1929 - 1 September 2021) was a French attorney. He was known for being the founding partner of the firm Bredin Prat. He was a member of the Académie française. He was elected on 15 June 1989. Bredin died on 1 September 2021 in Paris, aged 92.L’avocat et académicien Jean-Denis Bredin est mort ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French lawyers Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jean-Denis Bredin
